content:
I'm so glad you found those recommendations helpful! Celeste Ng, Taylor Jenkins Reid, Emily Giffin, Colson Whitehead, and Meg Wolitzer are all amazing authors, and their books are definitely worth checking out.

If you're looking for more recommendations or want to discuss any of these authors or books, feel free to ask! I'm always happy to chat about books and reading.

In the meantime, I wanted to ask: have you considered joining a book club or online reading community? These can be great ways to connect with other readers, discover new books, and participate in discussions about the books you're reading.

There are many online book clubs and reading communities out there, but some popular ones include Goodreads, Book of the Month Club, and Literary Guild. You could also search for book clubs or reading groups in your local area, as many libraries and bookstores host these types of events.

Let me know if you're interested, and I can provide more information or recommendations!
